page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { EMPLOYMENT Ballyrashane Creamery employs around {80 workers,22}of these drive the{10 tankers,which collect milk from farms. Most of the workers live within an 8km radius & work from before 6 am until 18:30.There is a general manager & 2 managers below him.Most of the rest work on the factory floor & some in the office. In the laboratory, technicians work to try & keep all the products germ free.Those on the factory floor in packaging butter or milk.There are store rooms in the factory & a huge freezer where many butter packs are stored before export.Many different brands of butter originate from the same creamery.Lactic acid is added to butter which is then sent to Saudi Arabia,as they prefer the sour taste.
